subject: RE: [junit] Re: tearDown not getting called if testXXX throws exception
msgSnippet: Dave, Thanks for getting back on this.  I will try it over the next few days - however I m wondering why tearDown wasn t in a finally block in the first place?
messageBody:
Dave,
Thanks for getting back on this. I will try it over the next few days - however I'm wondering why
tearDown wasn't in a finally block in the first place? Was it a design descision or just an error?

Pete
